com.flyingspaniel.nava.net

Class JRFC2617

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flyingspaniel.nava.net.JRFC2617

  • public class JRFC2617
extends Object
    Java Class for doing RFC 2617 Digest Authentication. Can also fallback and do RFC 2069

    See http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2617.txt and http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digest_access_authentication

    Note Though the responses exactly match those in the Wikipedia article and thise generated by Chrome, I never got this to actually work on test servers such as httpbin.org. So I cannot guarantee that this will actually work in a real environment. Help!

    Since:
    Copyright (c) 2013 by Morgan Conrad Some ideas borrowed from https://gist.github.com/slightfoot/5624590
    Author:
    Morgan Conrad
    See Also:
    This software is released under the MIT License

        cnonce - may be null, typical, in which case one will be created
